Package modele.modelisation

Class Figure

java.lang.Object
utils.Subject
modele.modelisation.Figure
public class Figure
extends utils.Subject
Modelisation du fichier PLY

C'est ici que se trouve toute les fonctions de manipulation de la figure.


Author:
Groupe G1
nathan-developpeur.com

    • tri

      public void tri()
      Sort the list of faces

      Sort the list of faces in the good order for print. The farthest is in first place and the closest in last place

      See Also:
      getFaces(), Face

    • center

      public modele.modelisation.Point center()
      Initializes the center point

      create the point who is at the center of the figures by the average of extremes point

      Returns:
      Point The center point
      See Also:
      getCenter(), getExtremePoint()

      String of the Figure

    • getExtremePoint

      public double[] getExtremePoint()
      Get the extreme points of the figure

      Return an array of double the the first to are the closest X and the Farthest X, the 2 next are the same but for Y and same things for Z

      Returns:
      double[] All the extreme point

    • deplace

      public void deplace​(double x, double y, double z)
      Move the figure

      Move the figures on all the axes

      Parameters:
      x - The value of the number of time you want to move the figure in the X axes.
      y - The value of the number of time you want to move the figure in the Y axes.
      z - The value of the number of time you want to move the figure in the Y axes.
